meaning_str.bing:
n. 手指；有…手指的（指类型）；有（或用）…手指的（指数目）
v. 用手指触摸；告发；告密
网络. 指状物；指针；指头

手指；有…手指的（指类型）；有（或用）…手指的（指数目）

手指；指头；指状物；指针；指示标志；一指宽；键盘操作者；（乐器的）指法；（手套的）指部
用手指触摸；拨弄；用手指弹奏；告发；告密；指认；识别；操纵

1.en: A flower picked from a garden, a finger-painted heart, a sparkly rock, or another small token is his way of saying you're special.
1.cn: 从花园里摘一朵花，一颗手涂的心，一粒闪闪发光的石头，一个有象征意义的小符号，都是他在说你很特别的方式。

2.en: The best way to put your finger on this as a designer is to immerse yourself in as much of the experience as possible.
2.cn: 作为网页制作者，最好的办法便是沉浸在大量的经历之中，越多越好。

3.en: His tiny hand was holding on to my finger, and I couldn't help remembering his mother's hand in mine over thirty years ago.
3.cn: 他的小手被控股就以我的手指，我无法帮助回忆他的母亲的手在矿井超过三十年前。

0.en: Pull my finger. My hand is messed up.
0.cn: 拉我的手指，我的手毁了。

1.en: You may want to lose the foam finger.
1.cn: 你不把这个泡沫大手指扔掉么？

2.en: Really? Who has seen the "Charlie bit my finger." "Charlie bit my finger. He bit my finger, Charlie." Oh, Charlie.
2.cn: 真的吗？谁看过查理咬了我的手指头。查理咬了我的手指头。他咬了我的手指头，查理。噢，查理。

3.en: Now, put your finger on it. Doesn't matter which finger. Good choice.
3.cn: 现在，把你的手指放上去，无所谓用哪根手指，明智的选择。

4.en: Damn it! I cut my finger! Happy Halloween. No, really, I cut myself. Look!
4.cn: 该死，我切到我的手指了。万圣节快乐。我是说真的，我切到手指了，你看！

5.en: Little finger sandwiches, too. This place is amazing. Interesting thing about finger sandwiches: you put enough of them together, you got a sandwich.
5.cn: 还有手指三明治 这地方棒极了。手指三明治有意思的是：你把足够分量拼起来，就能得到一个完整的三明治。

6.en: Do I have your blessing? Well, Sheldon, I think you should make her finger like Saturn and put a ring on it.
6.cn: 你会祝福我吗？谢尔顿...我觉得你应该将她的手指变成土星再往她手指上套个土星"环"。

7.en: The crab is pinching Grandpa Pig's finger. Ouch. Naughty, Mr. Crab.
7.cn: 这只螃蟹钳住爷爷的手指了。好疼。真是调皮的螃蟹。

8.en: Baby-proofing a guillotine? So you cut your finger off. It's part of the fun.
8.cn: 给断头台做防护？你把手指切断，这才是有趣啊。

9.en: And here we have a waitress brushing her teeth with her finger. AKA you.
9.cn: 而这是一位女招待，只会用手指抠牙齿而已，确切来说就是你。

10.en: I just have to get to Kai, grab his finger, and then, Skadoosh. Back to the Spirit Realm.
10.cn: 我只需要找到天煞，捏住他的手指，然后，走你，他就能滚回灵界。

11.en: Yeah. It's a front-projected holographic display combined with laser-based finger tracking. Here, I'll show you.
11.cn: 是啊，这是正投影全息显示加上手指激光跟踪器，来，我给你演示。

12.en: You didn't lift a finger. No, but I narrated the entire event, and I am paying for it today.
12.cn: 你昨天手指都没抬一下。是没有，但我为整个活动做了旁白，而今天我就得忍受那酸痛。

13.en: Except for a short time when Comanches cut off my great-great-great-grandmother's finger and stole it.
13.cn: 除了中间有一小段时间，印第安人把我曾曾曾祖母的手指切下来，把戒指偷走。

14.en: And what are you, widowed or divorced? Wedding ring is at least 30 years old and you've moved it to another finger.
14.cn: 你是寡妇还是离婚了？婚戒至少30年了，而你改用另一根手指戴了。

15.en: All right. All right. Maybe it will take my mind off it. You promise to buy me a big foam finger? You got it. All right.
15.cn: 好吧，或许能让我忘记伤痛，但你要帮我买个泡沫塑料做的大手指。一定。

16.en: And then just pick it with your finger, and if it's really al dente you'll still see a slight give in the middle. That's good.
16.cn: 用你的手指攥着它，如果捏起来很有劲道而中间还有一点弹性，那就可以了。

17.en: All right fine. Fine, I'll do it. I've just got to get this off the screen. Carol and Susan are still upset that you taught him pull my finger.
17.cn: 好吧，让我来，我们得把这个消掉，卡萝还在气你教他“拉我的手指”。

18.en: I think the one thing where I kind of lost it a little bit, He'd come down, he kind of like stutter-stepped, and spun And finger-rolled it.
18.cn: 我记最让我激动不已的是，看着他带球，突然急停转身手指很柔软地轻轻一投

19.en: I'm using benefit's WATTS UP. And I apply this highest portion up my cheek and then I'm gonna blend it with my finger.
19.cn: 我用的是benefit's的WATTS UP，我把最大的量涂在脸颊上，然后用手指涂抹匀。
